FuncDef:
The sub-ring command configures an ERPS ring as a sub-ring.
The undo sub-ring command restores the default configuration. The sub-ring command configures an ERPS ring as a sub-ring. The undo sub-ring command restores the default configuration. By default, all ERPS rings are major rings. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
ExtraInfo: ERPSv1 and ERPSv2 are currently available. ERPSv2 supports multi-ring topologies in addition to single ring topologies.To deploy ERPS on a multi-ring network, you must configure some rings as sub-rings.Major rings are closed, and sub-rings are open.
